name: Taku Hachisu
content: Profile | Taku Hachisu Skip to the content Skip to the Navigation Taku Hachisu (蜂須 拓, born 1987) is a Japanese computer scientist. He is an assistant professor at the Institute of Systems and Information Engineering, the University of Tsukuba. He received his PhD (Eng) at the University of Electro-Communications in 2015.
